snippet: Some in Ciudad Juárez have fought to get the government and the railroads to build a bypass there, while others argue that a city recovering from years of drug violence has more pressing needs.
lead_paragraph: Some in Ciudad Juárez have fought to get the government and the railroads to build a bypass there, while others argue that a city recovering from years of drug violence has more pressing needs.

headline.main: In Mexico, a Rail Line Splits a City and Views
headline.print_headline: In Mexico, a Rail Line Splits a City and Views
